name: Album Club (Mune Kyun): St. Paulia Jogakuin
overview: Album Club: Mune Kyun Saint Paulia Jogakuin is a game set in Japan that tells the story of a young schoolgirl and her robot through several mini-games such as Janken as she progresses through her daily activities, while the robot takes pictures of students for the school album. Cut-scenes take the form of anime and live-action.
